verses.name: Psalms 18:15
verses.text: Then the channels of waters were seen, and the foundations of the world were discovered at thy rebuke, O Lord, at the blast of the breath of thy nostrils.

verses.name: Psalms 18:16
verses.text: He sent from above, he took me, he drew me out of many waters.

verses.name: Psalms 18:17
verses.text: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them which hated me: for they were too strong for me.

verses.name: Psalms 18:18
verses.text: They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the Lord was my stay.

verses.name: Psalms 18:19
verses.text: He brought me forth also into a large place; he delivered me, because he delighted in me.
